hero__description.en: My name is Bekzod, I am 13 years old. I‚Äôm passionate about programming and currently work with Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, and React PWA. I mainly focus on security systems such as authentication and authorization (JWT, access token, refresh token). I always strive to learn new technologies and improve my projects.
